content.introduction:
Finds range-based for loops that can be replaced by a call to

std::any_of
 or 
std::all_of
. In C++20 mode, suggests

std::ranges::any_of
 or 
std::ranges::all_of
.

Example:

bool
 
all_even
(
std
::
vector
<
int
>
 
V
)
 
{


  
for
 
(
int
 
I
 
:
 
V
)
 
{


    
if
 
(
I
 
%
 
2
)


      
return
 
false
;


  
}


  
return
 
true
;


  
// Replace loop by


  
// return std::ranges::all_of(V, [](int I) { return I % 2 == 0; });


}
